title: Darkness and Alienation
body:
## Prologue to object oriented political economy of the future / Mantrov’s letter from the russian prison

### Preface

In my previous works, which by some lucky chance appeared on the web in last year (f.e. letter #3 from Squared Paper Notebook or my note about Revolution Populi). I stated very unusual thoughts about Flat Economic Systems and cryptocurrencies market. I tried to interpret these phenomena from position of Marxism and object oriented philosophy. Lately I thought that stated thoughts need a detailed commentaries and some corrections. My distance communications with Stefanie, who translated my note about Revolution Populi into German caused this idea in so far as Stefanie. encountered with some difficulties of understanding in the process of translation. But commencing upon certain places from this works, I broached a number of matters because in its absence valuable understanding of my works remained owing the impossibility. So from Fiat Economic Systems and cryptocurrencies market I crossed to description of object oriented ontological model, within the framework of which I was interpreting such phenomena as Power, Money, Metaphysics and production of alienation under  capitalism. I formed the opinion that understanding of these phenomena needs the conception of plural Time. Considerable part of this text was given for it.And, after all I tried as clearly as possible articulate thoughts about unavoidable interruptions in Russian prison.

### Formative power in the Dark Universe of objects.

You can remember that in my some previous works descripted confrontation (and undercover complicity) of Fiat Economic Systems with cryptocurrencies market as confrontation (and undercover complicity) between two forces of opposite ontological sides. It looks like very big and not well grounded words. Even with reserve that the question is particular pattern of Ontological Decay in regard to integrity of political and economic formations.

From position of plane ontology and taxonomy in regard of beings/things/objects are groundless. But narration about confrontation (and undercover complicity) of opposite ontological sides suspiciously looks like such taxonomy. Therefore I need to explain that it is nothing of the kind. For this task I must commit to paper my interpretation on phenomena of Formative Power and any economic / political supremacy in the light of object oriented ontology.

Object oriented ontology as is well known regards all of existent like set of discrete objects. Like set of ontological equivalent units of existence which reciprocally devoid of direct access to being-in-itself of each other. Object oriented anthology suppose what objects can come onto various types of relations and forms a new compound objects. But accentuating what isolated being-in-itself of objects never can exhausted by sum-total of its relations.

In this connection I suggest consider phenomenon of Formative Power in the light of compound objects’ forming. Compound objects, which grounded on such types of relations as exploitation, parasitism and obsession between separate objects/things/beings. Compound objects which appears not so much in space as in time. Which strives for self-conservation. And for expansion at the same time.

But for a store we will make an excursion into history of European philosophy.

### Frozen Becoming

As a whole in history of European philosophy Nietzsche and Heidegger very equivocal persons. But great importance of certain theirs conceptions is impossible not to admit. First of all I mean thesis about direct close relation between values (as metaphysics production of truths) and exploitation (as realization of will to Power). However theirs intuitions about strategy of Power inside the Time are of interest for us too. As Nietzsche wrote will to Power at highest manifestation strives “to imprint a traits of Being on stream of Becoming/Time”.

I remember these words very often. May be, as far as live in Russia. And can feel as Power is imprinting a traits/features/outlines of soviet and imperial past on stream of Time/Becoming by experience. But I don’t think that Formative Power on the national space is solely work of certain obscurantist people. As far as human beings doesn’t exists in metaphysical vacuum (as thought Kant). Human beings always faded into non-human space. Non-human objects often keep human beings in certain lines. It forms human units and collectives in the capacity of subjects/actors. It is hardware. What do you want from ice desert from the middle of which installed tap flowing with Hydrocarbonic Putrid Money? No wonder that human beings, who once found selves at the tap will erect by all possible means a obstructive infrastructure , which can keep this state forever. Therefore in our part of the world time is never running.

### Complicity with darkness

Attentive to detail reader could notice in previous chapters some contradictions. On the one hand I said about existent as about set of discrete units, whose being-in-itself allays withdrawn from direct admission for other units, recalling Graham Harman’s thesis about reciprocal darkness of objects. But on the other hand I am asserting what human subjects are formed by process of material production. That is product of interactions with non-human beings/things/objects. And it looks like some inconsistency. But I am going to wind up this impression. By conception of compound objects production.

What I main problem of human beings? I think that main problem consists in the fact that human beings never have any possibility of direct admission not only to being-in-itself. I is evidently. Our being-in-itself is always clot of impenetrable darkness. We interact to it by language, which make thinking possible. But language itself is object of the outer world.

We perceive ours own bodies in the same capacity too. As objects, whose existence was given to us indirectly by means of sensory instrumental interface.

It is understandable that such state of things cause impossibility of any true knowledge for human beings. Both about ourselves and about the outer world. The only possible move in regard knowledge of ourselves and other units of existent is interaction with these units. Interaction which cause production of new compound objects. For example, right now I participate in forming of new compound object enjoying equal rights participate as well: language by means of that I am thinking squared paper notebook and fountain pen by earns of those I am recording thoughts, some books from my bedside table, which I am quoting and the prison camp where I am serving my sentence. I never understand neither myself nor the outer world of dark discrete objects. But interacting with it I can participate in extraction of new compound objects and types of complicities which never can exhaust this darkness.

I think that it is the basis of not only human knowledge/cognition, but also of biological evolution. Extraction of complicities from darkness. Movement from the one unknown to the other into space of contingency. And I think that Marx meant just such activity in the field of human existence by name of Unalienated Labor. From time to time this phenomenon can show itself in fields of science, art and policy.

But if Marx considered unalienated labor as primordial modules of human existence, I don’t think that this thought is well grounded. Human beings for the most part of one’s own history were oppressed by big compound objects that holds their phenomenological situation of human and non-human beings on big compound objects. On existence in the capacity of its components. That’s mechanics of powerful interactions. Of course, not all compound objects grounded on powerful interactions. But just it is ground of such types of relations as exploitation parasitism and obsession, which always play important part in the Human History. As far as blind intuition of biological survival always keep up such types of relations. In spite of the fact that in this way survival sooner or later appear itself as impossibility of living the Life, as Reza Negarestani wrote.

Whatever happens that ecosystems (as big compound objects), which appeared in contingent way, often strives to close itself for contingent complicity with Plural Darkness of Being. This problem is basis of narration within some chapters of Negarestani’s “Cyclonopedia”. Referring the refer to Polish philosopher Roman Ingarden, Negarestani articulate that Ciosing (Cioture) is priority for Open Systems and niches as areas of Power projections, which suppress undesirable interactions and communications. Openness of niche opens it in order that do it closed. And close it in order that do it open.

Human formations always exist in the middle of these contingent complicities of plural darkness with plural darkness. Because naïve anthropocentric escapism in the shape of striving for conservation of safety condition in the middle of this space only can alienate system from functional understanding of the environment. Thus striving for safety and surplus control turns out only opposite results. Just keep up the current affaires of global policy. In this way I think what radical eco-oriented thinking must give up completely value of safety as conception.

### Plural Time and Cyclic Production

I must elaborate on one more conception, which I used above. When I am talking about stream of Time/Becoming, someone would think that I am talking about kind of continuum. But it is not right. My understanding of Time corresponds to antichloristic thinking of object oriented philosophy. In this way Time must be understood as measure of interactions between isolated objects. But as far as not all objects interacts with each other (quite the contrary most of objects just can not detect one another), in place of one interobjective scale we must tell about a great number of discrete scales. In this way production of new compound objects must caused production of new interobjective temporal dimensions. Especially if we tell about compound objects, which use mechanics of powerful interactions. That is such types of relations as exploitation, parasitism and obsession. In this regard tell that teleology of Power is complete stasis, is not quite right.

Of course, on the one hand, complete stasis as substitute of immortality is obsession of many Authoritarian Formations. But on other hand, complete of many Authoritarian Formations. But on other hand, complete stasis is impossible ideal. Nothing happens once and for all. In real life formations forced to reproduce itself. Permanent reproduce by means of technology, by means of economic force, by means of discourse and by means of violence. As we tell about any political and economic supremacy we must understand this phenomena in the light of transformation of many temporal currents into one general quasi-continuum of Production Cycles. This mechanics is simple. The more you are involved in reproduction elements, the less you have time for any other complicities. In this way existence of many objects become alienated on behalf of one compound construction. But just how existential alienation holds a phenomenologic situation of objects within temporal limits of Cyclic Production? I think   that matter must be researched in the light of Latour’s Actor Network Theory. That allow us to consider such phenomena as Formative Power and Alienation under Capitalism as product of complex network running/functioning. Of network, which consist of many (certain) human and non-human actors. Of network, which able to reorganize itself. And which able to break itself. What remained of Power after such deconstruction apart from blind intuition of survival and fear of the Life?

### Factory of delusions

Of course, this task needs a some other circumstances than I have in prison. But nevertheless I shall try to state some my thoughts here. Let’s return to Nietzsche, he discovered direct connection between will to power and establishment of values. View on the values is view on the Symptom of Power on the side of those who establish a values. That is general Nietzsche’s thesis in this regard. As he wrote, possibility of Valuation direct depend on possibility of exploitation within human population. Accordingly he consider egalitarian political movements (which struggle against exploitation) as motive force of Nihilism. It is understandable. Value of aristocratic lifestyle guarantees existence of serfdom. Value of free citizen’s lifestyle in the ancient Greece guarantees existence of Slavery. Values of one man’s life guarantees depreciation of other Nietzsche (in political sense) is more right than Adolf Hitler, Donald Trump and

But what is act of Valuation itself? Nietzsche connected it with fields of Art and Aesthetics. He considered the Art as the most clear expression of Will to Power and Establishment of Values. But nonetheless such conceptions as will to Power and Art within his works remained a kind of thing-in-itself Heidegger attempted to clarify these Nietzsche’s conceptions. He placed it in the context of relations between delusions and truth. In the context of epistemology. I think that this Heidegger’s gesture must be interpreted in the way of object oriented philosophy.

Heidegger took thesis about fundamental gap between true world (which completely inaccessible for all beings/objects) and apparent world (as space of perceptible objects) as a starting point proceeding from that Heidegger postulated imperative value of delusions as truth/verity substitutes. Human beings are doomed to produce delusions by means of forming and transformation of appearances. In the opinion of Heidegger, that is essence of the Art (as realization of will to power). And also that is essence of the Valuation. The Valuation is instrument of Power. By means of that Power “imprint traits/features o Being on stream of Time/Becoming.”

But Heidegger correlate Valuation not only with Art, but also with Metaphysics. How we should understand thought about direct connection between Metaphysics, Valuation and will to power in the light of object oriented philosophy? Let’s take as a starting point Nietzsche’s thesis that “View on the Values” is “View on the conditions for rise and conservation of large formations within/inside stream of Time (Becoming)”. What is a function of metaphysics at process of rise/conservation of large human formations? As I think it is instrument of viscosity. Teleology of metaphysics/ideology/discourse (under these names I mean any various kinds of production that makes delusions in the capacity of truths, taking into account that any discourse turns into metaphysics in proportion as it strives to from a hermetically sealed circle of references) is identical with teleology of economic exploitation and (non-economic) compulsion (by violence).As far as all of these instruments holds phenomenologic situations of objects/human beings within certain fixed limits in order to conservation of large economic/political formations as compound objects). This teleology is alienation of Life (as venture search of complicities with Unknown) from itself.

In contrast to Heidegger I don’t think what making of delusions (in the capacity of truths have Imperative Value for human existence as such. Moreover I think that this thesis as such is fixing of certain delusion in the status of truth. In fact, we can not postulate about human being-in-itself something fixed. Apart from that human existence is finite, breakable and isolated from other beings/objects thing. That is darkness beyond any discourse. Of course from this darkness may be extracted various relations and compound objects which may be descripted in form of rough plans/diagrams/maps of reality. But these plans/diagrams/maps (by analogy with of paradigm in science history) is plans/diagrams/maps of certain configuration between objects. It must be destroyed in case of any reconfiguration. And fixing of some plans/diagrams/maps of reality in the capacity of invariable truth always serves for conservation of some economic and political formations. Therefore, production of delusions as truths (or truths as delusions) have Imperative value not for all human being but only for beneficiaries of certain (some) human configurations. But they also pays  loss of phenomenologic mobility for that. Any social consciousness is consciousness of escapism as far as it does not destroy itself.

But social consciousness doesn’t exist within vacuum. It Is a product and at the same time a function element of formative (re)production. As far as metaphysical production direct connected with such conceptions as necessity and conformity with (natural) laws that is ground of economic exploitation and compulsion is ground of discourse/metaphysical production. If all this instruments of viscosity effectively keep up each other human existence found itself inside hermetically sealed space of cyclic reproduction. There is no way out from here.

### Monetary metaphysics

When we talk about Values in the context of Nietzsche’s philosophy it goes without saying what we talk about metaphysics ideology/discourse. But I think that concentrate one’s attention on discourse in case of Formative Power studies we fall into humanities/humanist delusion. We should mention one another field of human relations, which completely correspond to with metaphysics as essence of nihilism and nihilism as essence of metaphysics.

Ideological supporters of Fiat Economics often talks what cryptocurrencies market is “big financial bubble”, “global swindle” and so forth. As far as in the opinion of them value cryptocurrencies is nothing guaranteed/ensured/supported in the real. of course it is not so in actual fact.  Value of cryptocurrencies is guaranteed/supported by demand for instrument that makes economic relations possible beyond limits of governmental and banking control. But that is not the point. The point is that we can move/transfer this critique back. Against Fiat Economics.

On what grounds Fiat Money have value? What is guarantee of that? It is just symptom of Power on the side of those who postulate (establish) this value in Nietzsche’s terms, is not it? Of power as compulsion by means of laws and violence. Of power as product of complex network running/functioning. Of network which consist of many human and non-human actors. Fiat Economics not able to lines of barbed wire and other elements, which put together a machinery of Formative Violence.

Circulation of Fiat Money is grounded on governmental control of human economic relations, that is driven by force into space of Fiat Economic. But at the same time machinery of governmental is grounded on circulation of Fiat Money. That is network running/functioning which formed a circle. That is cyclic (re)production of Formative Power.

In the light of that phenomenon of cryptocurrency is of special interest. As infrastructure by means of that life can escape from complicity with industry of alienation, which guards present day political/economic formation against invasions of unalienated life. Phenomenon of cryptocurrency showed that fields of economic relation between people may be putted out from network, which produces control, exploitation and compulsion as Complex of Formative Power. This phenomenon shown subversive potential of technological decentralization that able to incapacitate ground and integrity of present day political/economic authorization formations. Therefore I think that we should interpret as pattern of machinery that turns large compound objects into multiplicity of many new discrete beings/ into plural Darkness as space of new complicities with Unknown.

### Hyperimmunity and dialectic of Decay

In my previous works I tried to interpret confrontation (and undercover complicity) between Fiat Economics and Cryptocurrency market as confrontation (and undercover complicity) between faces of opposing ontological sides. The pole of Decay/differentiation/Disintegration versus the Pole of Power/Integration/Capitalistic Supremacy. But lately my comrade D. in correspondence with S. expressed thought about defectiveness of this interpretation. As D. considers in the real all of us everyday have to do with only one independent ontological Pole. That is one planetary production network system which produces alienation. System which integrates all local formations and political/economic supremacies. That is Global Capitalism. As machinery that converts the earth (together with all human and non-human objects of that) into Added Value, State Control and Political Supremacy. The total sun of human history as ecological, economic and political phenomenon.

Comrade D. stated thought that formation decay is none other than side effect/result of striving for strengthening/reinforcement of Formative Power, state Control and Economic Exploitation. That is naïve escapism of biological survival. Of survival that permanently forced to encounter with lack/shortage of one’s own existence s the heart of the one’s own nature that cant run away from this existential lack.

I was thinking about this dialectic a long time. And concluded that such dialectical interpretation indeed able to describe machinery of formation decay as well as possible. Moreover in the light of that interpretation my be described not only phenomenon formations. And history of science as well.

As far as Power is not only exploitation and compulsion but also permanent strengthening/reinforcement of compulsion and exploitation (as wrote Heidegger when he was commenting Nietzsche), Formative Power faces with the problem of technological reinforcement/updating/modernization as applied to one’s own machinery. There is economic reasons apart from anything else. All formations which grounded on exploitation faces with the prospect that is unavoidable exhaustion of exploitable resources. Money petroleum ozone layer and biological variety are dwindling. Substratum of survival turns into non-existence. By force of that formations strives for expansion of exploitation and increase of it effectiveness. By men’s of technologies. In other words by means of activities that is extracting new compound objects/things/beings from interobjective darkness of the Unknown. In order to that formation must admit life (as complicity with the Unknown) inside one’s own formative space. Must loose  work of viscosity and powerful interactions within cyclic reproduction of Formative Power.

But extraction/construction of new compound objects/beings is essentially a process with unpredictable consequences. Irrespective of tasks in order to which new compound objects are extracted/constructed, these objects find one’s own being-in-itself can form a new structures of complicities with human and human objects. That can cause faults/defects in cycles of Power, Control and Added Value. Faults and defects that can cause appearance/forming of local spaces with lowered viscosity, where objects can get the opportunity of temporary liberation from formative compulsion, exploitation and control. Of local spaces where formations body begin to decay. It disintegrates to multiplicity of new objects/beings/things.

Moreover, from time to time Formative Power tries to use extraction/construction of new compound objects in order to liquidation of consequences which caused by extraction/construction of compound objects in the past. Sometimes such reaction of system can completely disable (put out of action logic of cyclic reproduction itself. Can turn cyclic reproduction into spiral movement to darkness of the Unknown.

Such phenomenon as genesis of the internet I direct connected with striving of various science institutions for increase of effectiveness in regard to one’s own research work. By means of increase of information exchange. In point of facts, science institutions functions as instruments of the capital and formative power. Of ststaes (govermenents) and corporations. Instruments which for the most part serves needs of defense industry and economic/ecological exploitation. Just get acquainted with statistic about correlation of investment between applied and fundamental scientific research works and statistic about sources of this investment (that is adduced in Bruno Latour’s work “science in action”) In spite of all these facts, just only because of science itself as optimal medium for development of decentralization that able to dissolve basis of any Formative power.

Onion routing is created in order to increase of security in the field of network communication for US Navy. MDMA is side product of scientific research works in the field of military psychostimulants in the third Reich. Lysergic acid diethylamide is created by accident inside the laboratory of large-scale pharmaceutical corporation. Owing to all this non-human objects we have phenomenon of present-day black market in the Deep Web.

Human beings can escape control , exploitation and compulsion only owing to side effects and side products of striving for strengthening/reinforcement of Formative Power, State Control and Economic Exploitation. Human freedom is symptom of immune hyperactivation within machinery of Formative Power.

Power of Romanovs’ House in the Russian Empire tried to reinforce itself by means of conprecendeted privileges of nobility/gently. Power interpret this social class as one’s own ground. But that strategy of power turned out otherwise 19th century began to take shape just owing to this social class.

Just nobleman’s organized Insurrection of Decembrist. Let’s go on.

In the middle of 19th century the Russian Empire developed education. Including technical education, that was corresponding to needs of early capitalistic industry. But that caused many social alterations. Formation of new social classes/ for example class of intellectuals not of gentle birth that became a social basis of narodnik movement and various socialist organizations. Just activists of narodnik movement assassinated tsar Alexander on 1881. By means of bomb. Development of technical education was bearing fruits in the field of applied chemistry. In the way the people’s will commenced traditions of revolutionary terrorism in the Russia. That is pattern of the Russian life and history. *Khokhloma*.

*2022 January*

title: Cutting Through the Noise: Token Metrics To Keep An Eye On
body:
As we sit in a bear market - there’s increasing amounts of noise echoing from every direction - particularly on Twitter where sentiment has been chaotic to say the least. It’s become difficult to focus on fundamentals and easy to get carried away by the panic. Over the last few months we’ve encountered a turning point in the macro-economic environment with decade-high inflation paired with the start of quantitative tightening (QT) which has led to risk-assets (such as technology stocks & crypto) to be out of favor. Mix that in with the UST de-peg/LUNA collapse along with cascading liquidations for the likes of Celsius & 3AC.

As someone who’s experiencing the rollercoaster of emotions from the heights of a crypto bull to a winter for the first time - keeping an eye on fundamental metrics has helped me focus on projects that generate revenue and have significant usage/adoption. At the end of the day, blockchains are not just currencies - and can be valued similar to traditional businesses as they generate cash flows through fees that are distributed to token-holders and supply side participants.

At its crux, crypto protocols:

* Provide a Service
* Charge a fee for the service
* Allocate fees between supply side participants & token-holders

The image below is a helpful representation of the above information for the likes of Bitcoin, Ethereum, Uniswap & Sushiswap

![Token Terminal](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rDpYCm-Ui5qNGTxYbN2IM.png?height=356&width=1448)

Keeping this in mind, let’s take a look at some Key Performance Indicators (KPI’s) and how they apply to a specific sector/type of protocol within the DeFi landscape. It’s important to note that these metrics are not a holistic measures of performance. Macro-economic, technological and several other qualitative factors such as narrative and speculation can drive the price of these digital assets. However, these metrics can be a useful gauge to evaluate projects against each other in their respective sectors and based on the activities they facilitate.

## 1) Total Value Locked (TVL)

Sum of all assets deposited in the smart contract of the underlying protocol/blockchain. The calculation of TVL can differ from project to to project based on what services they facilitate whether its borrowing/lending, decentralized exchanges or trading. Since the operations of DeFi applications differ, the they might not be fully comparable through TVL and therefore the metric can be misleading. It does, however offer a standardized way of analyzing them.

![Top Dapps by TVL - Token Terminal](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QFT8-8TLPd1vF0B6EGNvf.png?height=1134&width=2240)

As seen above - a mixture of DEX’s and lending protocols make up most of the leaders in TVL. For a decentralized exchange (DEX) like Uniswap - that relies on an Automated Market Maker (AMM) model, the TVL is equal to the liquidity deposited by liquidity providers. More capital locked translates to lower slippage (i.e fluctuations in order prices).  However a better measure of its performance for a DEX like Uniswap would be through Trading Volume & Trading Fees Generated.

For a lending protocol like Compound TVL is calculated taking the difference between total assets deposited and total assets borrowed. A better way to look at the performance of a Lending protocol like Compound would be Borrowing Volume and Total Revenue or interest paid by borrowers.

It’s also important to understand whether the TVL generated is incentivized or non-incentivize as that can suggest how organic the demand for the protocol is.

## 2) Protocol Revenue

Protocol revenue is equal to the amount of revenue that is distributed to token-holders and the company behind the protocol. Can be thought of as profit margin/bottomline for a protocol to which revenue accrues to the token. Some protocols allocate cash flow to the token but like early stage and growth companies - several don’t. For example: Uniswap does not allocate cash flows to UNI holders whereas SushiSwap does.

![SushiSwap Protocol Revenue - Token Terminal ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rP-gGpDZJWLzZH8sbnT6i.png?height=1276&width=2312)

As seen above - a portion (\~ 15-20%) of SushiSwap’s total revenue is distributed to token-holders.

## Total Revenue and Supply-Side Revenue

Total revenue is equal to cumulative fees paid by the users over a specific time period. Supply side revenue is the portion of this that is paid to supply-side participants.

* For instance - In the case of an AMM (Automated Market Maker) such as Uniswap or Balancer - it could be the fees paid to Liquidity providers.

![UniSwap Total Revenue - Token Terminal](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7opEPTMTTDdnBHZqT3vzA.png?height=1232&width=2306)

In the case of Uniswap - as seen above all of Uniswap's total revenue is distributed to its users. i.e: supply side participants providing liquidity to a pool.

## Sector Specific Metrics:

Metrics can only give the right perspective about a protocol when considered in with respect to it’s underlying use case. Below are some metrics that are useful to compare protocols under the same category/sector.

### Decentralized Exchanges

* **Trading Volume**

The success of a Decentralized Exchange (DEX) can be gauged through the total volume it facilitates. Higher trading volumes can potentially translate to increased cash flow for protocol participants such as token-holders and liquidity providers.

![DEX Trading Volume - Token Terminal](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dHeasPYQuRbmuxsBjZhAr.png?height=1222&width=2294)

Looking at the top DEX protocols by trading volume over the last 180 days it looks like Uniswap has the highest volume (does not accrue to token-holders) followed by dYdX.

### Lending/Borrowing:

* **Borrowing volume**

Borrowing volume is equal to the total value of outstanding loans of a lending protocol.

*Ex: Goldfinch Finance (GFI)*

![Goldfinch Borrowing Volume vs Market Cap- Token Terminal](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GZtovr9A9FQ66V18xTbi-.png?height=1306&width=2324)

Goldfinch Finance - a decentralized credit protocol that unlocks crypto lending for the emerging market is seeing a large increase in borrowing volume. It’s market cap however has taken a tumble which can be viewed as a good opportunity when paired with the increasing revenue and TVL.

![Goldfinch Protocol Revenue - Dune ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/eaLd_vrz8IOKSWMlpSjkW.png?height=688&width=1884)

### 

![Goldfinch TVL - Dune ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PvBJsxY-iV4F5zO6cvroj.png?height=752&width=1854)

There are several other DeFi protocols such as Asset Management & derivatives protocols bringing the world of financial structured-products into crypto. I plan to dive into those in a separate post. But for now, I hope this provides enough information to traverse the huge number of protocols and narrow down based on fundamental metrics like these.

## Conclusion

The crypto industry has come a long way in the past few years and the pace of development as left us with a diverse landscape of protocols. With an increasing number of them to consider, I’ve found it helpful to use fundamental metrics like these to separate real value from the hype. Re-emphasizing the fact that assets aren’t priced based on solely fundamentals - a multitude of other factors come into play (macro, narrative, tech) which makes it crucial to make decisions holistically. An exciting property of blockchains are that applications built on them are public/open which means that we can access *real-time* (network, usage and financial information) sitting in our very bedrooms. This idea of open data makes me excited - as it can facilitate better, quicker decision making and deeply benefit stakeholders in the ecosystem by democratizing access to data.

title: 科威特伊斯兰银行Warba Bank宣布入驻Decentraland和The Sandbox
body: BlockBeats 消息，7 月 3 日，总部位于科威特的伊斯兰银行 Warba Bank 宣布入驻 Decentraland 和 The Sandbox，旨在通过元宇宙与年轻一代用户交互沟通。该行支持服务副总裁 Anwar Bader Al-Ghaith 称，虚拟现实能更贴近客户地介绍其产品和服务并以创新的方式与客户交流。

title: Forta: 领先的Web3安全和运营监控实时监控网络
body:
Forta 是领先的 Web3 安全和运营监控实时检测网络，最近宣布了代币空投计划，并于 6 月 15 日推出了官方 FORT 代币。 FORT 代币是 Forta 路线图中 ”无需可启动（Permissionless Launch）“的一个关键里程碑，其使命是监控所有交易并保护 Web3 中的所有资产。现在，早期贡献者现在可以领取 FORT 代币作为空投的一部分。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yYbV9wY2BMWuKQYOQGVo1.png?height=664&width=1398)

## 项目介绍

Forta 是一个去中心化的监控网络，用于实时检测 DeFi、NFT、治理、Bridges 和其他 Web3 系统上的威胁和异常。Forta 的底层是一个由独立节点运营商组成的去中心化网络，它扫描所有交易和逐块状态更改以查找异常交易和威胁。当检测到问题时，节点运营商会向订阅者发送潜在风险警报，使他们能够立刻采取相关行动。

Forta 由 OpenZeppelin 孵化，是第一个用于区块链活动安全和运营监控的实时检测网络。协议、DAO、投资者和个人都可以使用 Forta 监控交易活动，并接收有关第 1 层、第 2 层和侧链上的安全、财务、运营和治理相关事件的问题警报。节点针对每个交易块运行检测机器人，当机器人检测到特定条件或事件时，网络会发出警报，该警报存储在 IPFS 上并链接到公共区块链上。

Forta 支持扫描多个区块链，目前包括 Ethereum、Polygon、BSC、Avalanche、Arbitrum、Optimism 和 Fantom。

官网：<https://forta.org/>

Twitter：<https://twitter.com/FortaNetwork>

> **如何开始使用**

用户可以通过各种应用程序订阅 Forta 数据源，包括[Forta App](https://app.forta.network/)、[OpenZeppelin Defender](https://openzeppelin.com/defender/)，或直接使用公共[Forta API](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xkxS7d2i5ms)，也可以使用SDK在 Forta 上开发和部署自己的检测机器人。开发者可以使用许多[模板](https://github.com/arbitraryexecution/forta-bot-templates)和[示例](https://github.com/forta-protocol/forta-bot-examples)，还可以聘请开发团队为自己的项目开发 Forta 机器人。

如果使用者是想要开发检测机器人的独立开发者，那么他可以访问 Forta 的[Bot Development Marketplace](https://www.notion.so/Detection-Bots-Development-Marketplace-f8584bee618746319e9615f7a045df37)以发现 RFP、申请资助或参加[Forta Discord](https://discord.com/invite/KACdTEutQq)中公布的 Forta 开发竞赛。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yt5rknZxblP6wTsV2Qv2a.png?height=944&width=1442)

**检测机器人（detection bots）：**

检测机器人是指 Docker 容器中的一组代码脚本，它们处理一些区块链数据（即区块或交易）并检测特定的威胁条件（例如是否发生了闪贷攻击，或者特定账户余额是否低于某个阈值）。机器人会针对他们的发现发出警报。机器人由扫描节点执行。

**扫描节点（scan node）：**

扫描节点是一种特定类型的 Forta 节点，它为特定区块链网络上的每笔交易和每个新区块执行检测机器人。扫描节点管理和协调机器人（例如，通过实例化和运行机器人，以及重新启动变得无响应的机器人）。扫描节点将区块链数据传送给机器人来处理交易/区块。

**监控类型：**

1. 运行监控（Operational monitoring）：检查你的协议是否在某些预定范围内按预期运行；
2. 威胁监控（Threat detection monitoring）：提供有关可能表明恶意活动的事务和事件的警报；
3. 其他：Forta 只是充当您可以想象的任何用例的实时监控层。

Forta 通过可以实施多种技术（包括交易模拟、异常检测和多链监控）的检测机器人为实时、逐块的高级监控提供最大的灵活性。Forta 机器人发出警报和发现，也可以完全定制。

此外，Forta 的分散式节点网络，由经济激励机制协调和驱动，提供无与伦比的可靠性，同时消除单点故障。

## **利用 Forta 的机器学习来提高 Web3 安全性**

大型漏洞利用在 Web3 生态系统中猖獗。2022 年 4 月，仅 5 次重大漏洞利用就导致总计 2 亿美元以上的资金被盗。安全审计和漏洞赏金计划是协议安全措施的重要起点，但它们不足以阻止黑客攻击和漏洞利用。一旦部署了智能合约，通常会与其他合约和协议进行许多复杂的交互，从而难以预测所有边缘情况和潜在的攻击向量。

Forta 是一个实时检测网络，可帮助 Web3 世界防止黑客攻击和漏洞利用。开发人员和研究人员社区可以创建检测机器人来监控区块链中的可疑交易，然后可以通过在区块链上订阅 Forta App 机器人用于收到最新提醒。 目前有超过 600 个检测机器人监控各种威胁，例如重新进入攻击和 Tornado 现金资助的交易。这些机器人可以发送及时的相关安全警报，可用于消除威胁并防止资金损失。

机器学习（ML）可以为 Web3 的安全带来巨大的价值。Forta 网络站在支持数据科学社区创新、研究和保护 web3 的最前沿。借助 ML，Forta 可以更准确地检测攻击，同时提供更相关和可操作的警报。

> **机器学习详解**

为了更有效地发现可疑活动，Forta 的检测机器人需要将攻击与良性事件分开。虽然在某些情况下通过简单的启发式方法可以做到这一点，但 ML 可以利用比人类更广泛的信号和数据集。这允许 ML 通过发现看不见的攻击并以高精度发出警报（即导致警报的良性事件数量较少）。在 Web3 中，快速交付最关键和最相关的警报以供审查和及时解决非常重要。

机器学习可以帮助更有效地完成上述所有工作。谷歌、微软和亚马逊等许多 Web2 公司已经严重依赖机器学习解决方案来检测异常事件，例如联网设备中的系统故障，网络钓鱼攻击和欺诈性在线支付交易等。

机器学习是一个结合统计学和数学的研究领域，可以帮助我们理解和利用数据。机器学习已经是当今大多数行业广泛采用的技术。普通消费者可能已经以电子商务产品推荐、疾病检测和自动驾驶汽车的形式看到了机器学习的实际应用。

与指定一组指令供计算机执行的传统编程相比，机器学习使计算机能够从过去的数据中学习并创建自己的指令集。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tLiiOeYi931ThADP-d25e.png?height=1126&width=1464)

例如，ML 可以分析过去的欺诈性信用卡交易并创建自己的规则来检测未来的类似活动。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/BIXThOD-IBEbe1SPW-JP7.png?height=630&width=1434)

ML 可以通过研究过去的黑客攻击和漏洞利用模式来检测可疑的 EOA 或智能合约行为。它还可以通过学习过去的“正常”区块链账户活动来标记新的异常行为。ML 还可以通过对类似警报进行聚类并按严重性/紧急性对其进行排名来帮助减少噪音并改善信号。

Forta 被设计为一个社区驱动的项目，并且会在 ML 领域拥有无穷无尽的机会，官方邀请了数据科学社区在 Forta 之上进行构建和创新。Forta 基金会致力于通过即将推出的教育材料、数据科学竞赛和赠款来支持这个独特的社区。

## FORT 代币上线

Forta 网络正在呼吁更广泛的 Web3 开发人员和安全专家社区加入其使命，以监控所有交易并保护 Web3 中的所有资产。FORT Airdrop 奖励早期社区成员和 Forta 的贡献者，但它也将播种更广泛的 Web3 生态系统的成员，这些成员通过他们的活动表明他们对 Web3 的健康增长、可持续性和安全性有长远的看法整个生态系统。

FORT 是以太坊网络中的 ERC-20 代币，

合约地址：0x41545f8b9472D758bB669ed8EaEEEcD7a9C4Ec29

质押仅在 Polygon 中可用，因此任何想要质押的人都需要将 FORT 连接到 Polygon（<https://wallet.polygon.technology/bridge>）。

为了确保网络提供的数据的准确性和完整性，Forta 采用工作代币模型，节点运行者必须质押 FORT 代币，以便将实时安全和运营数据广播到网络，任何人都可以质押 FORT 代币。为了在网络中发出检测机器人质量的信号。

FORT 有两个对网络正常运行必不可少的主要用途：

1. 节点运行者质押：节点运行者必须存入 FORT 代币，以便在网络中被发现并为他们正在执行的工作提供经济安全，因为如果节点未能执行分配的工作或恶意执行他们的工作，质押的 FORT 可能会被削减。一旦 FORT 被质押，它只能在解冻期后撤回，这为验证和解决争议提供了充足的机会。
2. 检测机器人信号：开发人员可以在机器人上质押 FORT 代币，向网络发送机器人质量信号，并提供抗女巫攻击机制。在网络上拥有假冒或低质量的机器人会导致更难找到最佳的风险检测产品。

在未来，持有 FORT 代币可以参与 Forta 生态治理并塑造 Forta 网络的未来。

目前，运行检测机器人和订阅 Forta 警报是免费的。

> **代币分发**

FORT 代币的总供应量上限为 1,000,000,000 FORT。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RthjGE4lg7I14rBsN_y6Z.png?height=948&width=1454)

FORT 社区分配（45.5%）由 Forta 基金会持有，不受特定归属或分配时间表的约束，但 FORT 代币智能合约白名单强制实施的技术转让限制将一直有效，直到实现无许可启动。

参与强化阶段的节点运行者已经从社区分配中获得了大约 200 万个 FORT 代币，这些代币在无许可启动时不受任何转移限制或锁定条件。同样，在 FORT 空投中收到的 FORT 代币将不受任何转移限制或锁定，因为它们将在实现无许可启动的同时可领取，并可立即在 Forta 网络中使用。

大约 2.2% 的社区分配已分配给 Forta 生态系统的某些成员，包括一些机器人开发人员、战略合作伙伴、基金会工作人员和其他供应商。在分配的约 2.2% 的 FORT 中，约 1.2% 受到 2 至 4 年的限制，另外约 1% 将在无许可启动时解锁并包含在流通供应中。

其他 FORT 代币分配包括由支持者、初始核心贡献者和 OpenZeppelin 持有的代币。三个组的限制会在 4 年线性归属期和 1 年悬崖效应期后取消或转移。几乎所有分配给这些组的 FORT 代币都于 2021 年 9 月 1 日开始归属，并将在 2025 年 9 月 1 日之前完全转让。

FORT 代币总供应量的 10% 已分配给 OpenZeppelin，并受制于 4 年线性归属期和 1 年悬崖期限。OpenZeppelin 的 FORT 代币分配的归属开始日期是 2021 年 9 月 1 日。

> **空投**

FORT 空投奖励早期 Forta 贡献者，并为更广泛的 Web3 安全社区提供 FORT 代币，以便他们可以开始在 Forta 网络上构建。26,769 个地址有资格在 Forta 空投中申领 FORT 代币。如果使用过 Forta、为 Web3 项目做出贡献或者是 Web3 生态系统的积极参与者，都可能符合条件。

每个类别和子类别都是离散和累积的，即一个地址可以有资格获得多个类别的奖励，并相应地为每个类别分配一定数量的代币。分配和标准细分如下：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dGKVDh5tmVHNlYYUxAyxc.png?height=630&width=1418)

1. Forta 用户是指从第一天起就为网络做出贡献的人，包括但不限于检测机器人开发人员、参与检测机器人开发竞赛的社区成员、警报订阅者和 Forta 扫描节点运营者。
2. Forta 贡献者是思想领袖和 Forta 使命的坚定支持者，并以有意义的方式为网络的发展和进步做出了贡献。
3. Web3 Github 贡献者包括为 900 多个Web3 Github 存储库做出积极贡献的开发人员。一个地址可以有资格获得多个并相应地分配一定数量的代币。
4. Ethernaut 是一个开源基础学习工具，向成千上万的开发人员教授智能合约安全的基础知识。Ethernaut 的粉丝继续构建和审核协议，通过结合 Ethernaut 中引入的关键安全概念来保护数十亿的 TVL。
5. Forta 受 Project Galaxy 支持创新开发者的倡议的启发，以太坊生态系统中的顶级开发者有资格获得 FORT 空投。这些被定义为部署具有最活跃交互的智能合约的编码人员。
6. Graph Protocol 子图开发人员是 Web3 的重要贡献者，有助于访问以太坊上去中心化应用程序的区块链数据。
7. 多重签名者可以是关键决策者、DAO 领导者或是有权访问大型资产池或控制关键协议功能的构建者。

### 总结

在Web3 生态系统中，安全性是行业整体成功与否的关键因素。尽管智能合约审计员在夜以继日地工作，黑客攻击仍然不定期频繁发生。安全保障需要一种更全面的方法，从审计、漏洞赏金一直到监控和事件响应各个方面落实。

Forta 作为一个实时检测网络，一直在致力于建立更坚固的安全监控方法，用于对区块链活动进行安全和运营监控，如今，Forta 监控的总价值数超过了 361 亿美元。现有的安全检测机器人监控广泛的安全相关活动，最终目标是缓解攻击并保护 Web3 生态安全。

作为 Forta 无许可启动的一部分，公开发布 FORT 令牌不仅是网络的一个重要里程碑，也是更广泛的 Web3 生态系统的一个重要里程碑。

监控和保护 Web3 经济是一项社区工作 —— Forta 需要开发人员、投资者、协议、DeFi 代和 NFT 收集者等，才能发挥其真正的潜力来保持 Web3 的安全。

不断壮大的 Forta 社区，现在拥有 FORT 代币，并持续致力于成为服务于 DAO、DeFi 和 NFT 生态系统的公共设施。Forta 需要建立一个由工程师、安全专业人员和基础设施提供商组成的更加强大的社区，用于研发高效的检测机器人、操作节点，并持续开发相关产品和服务，最终成功管理网络。

body:
天街小雨润如酥》|出典|释义|例句

【出典】唐·[韩愈](https://www.pinshiwen.com/shiji/hanyu/)诗《早春呈水部张十八员外二首》之一：“天街小雨润如酥，草色遥看近却无。最是一年春好处，绝胜烟柳满皇都。”

【释义】诗句描写春雨绵绵的情景。

【例句】①雨痕著物润如酥，草色和烟近似无，岚光罩目浓如雾。(赵善庆〔双调·水仙子〕《仲春湖上》)化用韩愈诗句，写仲春绵绵细雨中草色如茵的情景。②问城南春事何知，细草如烟，小雨如酥。(曹德〔双调·折桂令〕《江头即事》)化用韩愈诗句写春天小雨滋润，草木复苏的情景。

title: Swave：创新全息技术将颠覆元宇宙可视化市场
body:
近年来，随着元宇宙概念的突然爆火到持续普及，人们对未来元宇宙世界的发展寄予了很高期望，其中对XR技术的需求正呈现持续增长，基于VR/AR技术构建的元宇宙是一个虚拟的3D世界，进入其中的用户可以获得沉浸式的游戏或工作体验。Swave全息扩展现实（HXR）技术是元宇宙的前沿技术，可提供逼真的高分辨率3D图像，通过数十亿个微小、密集的像素实现1000倍像素分辨率，以形成真正逼真的“20/20” 视觉，且无需用户佩戴AR/VR头显或处方眼镜；另外Swave HXR技术可投射逼真的全息图像，消除了当今AR/VR/XR焦深和眼动追踪的挑战，因此用户可以轻松专注于附近和远处的物体。最重要的是，HXR芯片采用标准CMOS技术制造，可实现具有成本效益的缩放。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6Xx9m7Pf9DwHLmkEtt5lK.png?height=648&width=1404)

### 项目简介

Swave 是一家元宇宙全息技术开发商，Swave 首席执行官兼创始人 Theodore Marescaux 表示，该公司愿景是建立基本的全息技术，将元宇宙带入生活和工作中，通过提供支持的真实、逼真和身临其境的虚拟世界体验，最终取代现有 AR/VR 头显设备。

Swave Photonics 是一家无晶圆半导体公司，设计和销售基于专有衍射光子技术的全息芯片。Swave 是 Imec 的衍生产品，是他们多年研究的结晶。它的使命是让显示器制造商和内容创作者能够通过沉浸式、超高分辨率、逼真的真正全息显示器来颠覆可视化市场。Swave 设想了一个全息显示的世界，让每个人都有能力想象不可能的事情、协作和完成更多事情。其突破性的全息扩展现实千兆像素技术将在未来的工作中发挥关键作用，使世界各地的人们能够在远程工作时参与身临其境的视频会议。Swave 计划与领先的 AR/VR/XR 和元宇宙平台合作，以便公司可以在会议桌旁共享逼真的 3D 体验。

官网：<https://www.swave.io/>

### 团队成员

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/BLd7K8Gy2vgn3s3hCPwMm.png?height=480&width=1408)

**Theodore Marescaux：CEO and Co-founder**

Theo 是消费电子领域的变革型发明家、技术主管和企业家。Theo 是 MuuseLabs 在消费电子和音频流领域的联合创始人兼首席执行官。此前，他曾在巴可担任数字电影产品经理和视频 IP 核心业务经理。他在 IMEC 开始了他的职业生涯，担任多处理器 SoC 和片上网络的硬件/软件架构领域的研究员。Theo 拥有 TU/Eindhoven 的微电子学博士学位和 Vlerick 的 MBA 学位。

**Dmitri Choutov：COO and Co-founder**

Dmitri Choutov 是半导体领域的领先先驱和工程主管。Dmitri 在半导体技术开发和转让、产品管理和制造方面拥有 25 年的经验。在 Swave 之前，Dmitri 曾在 National Semi、Maxim Integrated 和 Lam research 等知名企业担任工程和管理职务，并在 Luxera、Crocus 和 Atomera 等初创公司担任创始人和执行职务。

### 融资信息

Swave 于 2022 年 6 月 28 日宣布完成 700 万欧元种子轮融资，风险投资基金 imec.xpand、公共投资基金 Flanders Future Techfund 领投，比利时高校风险投资基金 QBIC 参投。

imec.xpand 合伙人 Peter Vanbekbergen 认为，Swave 千兆像素全息技术可以颠覆当前价值 930 亿美元的、基于 AR/VR 的元宇宙市场。

信息补充：

Imec 是世界领先的纳米电子和数字技术研究和创新中心。Imec 利用其最先进的研发基础设施及其由 5,000 多名员工和顶尖研究人员组成的团队，在先进半导体和系统扩展、硅光子学、人工智能、超越 5G 通信和传感技术以及应用领域等领域进行研发。健康和生命科学、移动性、工业 4.0、农产品、智慧城市、可持续能源和教育。Imec 联合半导体价值链中的世界行业领导者、法兰德斯和国际技术、制药、医疗和 ICT 公司、初创企业以及学术界和知识中心。Imec 总部位于鲁汶（比利时），在比利时、荷兰和美国设有研究机构，并在中国、印度、台湾和日本。2021年，Imec的收入（损益）总计7.32亿欧元。

### 技术信息

**全息扩展现实 (HXR) 技术：**

Swave 的全息扩展现实 (HXR) 技术为虚拟世界提供逼真的肉眼可见的高分辨率 3D 图像。HXR 技术通过数十亿个微小、密集的像素实现了 1000 倍的像素分辨率，以实现真正逼真的“20/20”视觉，而无需观看者佩戴智能 AR/VR 头显或处方眼镜。Swave 的 HXR 技术投射逼真的全息图像，消除了当今 AR/VR/XR 焦深和眼球追踪的挑战，因此使用者可以轻松地专注于附近或远处的物体。最重要的是，HXR 芯片采用标准 CMOS 技术制造，可实现具有成本效益的缩放。

Swave HXR 技术提供亚 ½ 波长像素和超高分辨率技术，以应对真正的沉浸式 3D 挑战。仅从芯片上的 2D 全息图就可以完全重建代表所有场景的 3D 光波，在所有方向上，在空间中的任何点都具有完美的焦点，这是一个十分微小的像素（低于 220nm），像素的极小尺寸（低于 ½ 波长）可以使其完美地衍射光。因此，这使 Swave 成为全息术的理想推动者。Swave 像素大小比其他技术的像素小 250 到 2000 倍，可以实现在同一区域中具有多个相邻像素的超高分辨率。

利用基于衍射光学的光子学和全息技术的进步，Swave 的 HXR 千兆像素技术针对虚拟宇宙平台、360 度全息墙、3D 游戏、AR/VR/XR 眼镜、协作视频会议以及用于汽车和航空航天系统的平视显示器等方面。Swave 技术还可以为全息头显提供动力，提供身临其境的 3D AR/VR/XR 体验，通过高分辨率、完美的焦深以及180 度至 360 度的视角，所有这些都不会让传统头显用户感到头疼。

值得一提的是，基于HXR 千兆像素技术提供支持的应用程序将能够通过视觉图灵测试，在该测试中，虚拟现实环境与人类亲眼看到的真实世界图像实际上没有差别。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TpHE1MzBS_Zh7wjy8149F.png?height=826&width=1408)

### 应用场景

**将元宇宙带入生活：**

Swave 的 HXR 十亿像素技术面向虚拟世界平台、360 度全息墙、3D 游戏、AR/VR/XR 眼镜、协作视频会议以及汽车和航空航天系统的平视显示器等领域。Swave 技术还可以为全息头显提供动力，提供身临其境的 3D AR/VR/XR 体验，使虚拟现实与人类亲眼看到的真实世界图像几乎没有差别。

Swave 的 HXR 千兆像素技术将在未来的工作中发挥关键作用，使世界各地的人们能够在远程工作的同时参与身临其境的视频会议。Swave 计划与领先的 AR/VR/XR 公司和 metaverse 平台合作，以便在未来更多的公司员工可以真正拥有在会议桌旁一起讨论的 3D 世界体验。

### 产品介绍

**为真实的现实做好准备。**

Swave 的 HXR 微芯片产品可批量生产，具有成本效益且可靠。大芯片版本 (2 cm x 2 cm) 专为超高端全息显示应用而设计，而微型 (0.5 cm x 0.5 cm) 版本则针对超轻量的可穿戴设备。最初的 HXR 芯片样品计划于 2023 年提供。未来版本的 HXR 芯片将针对其他新兴的 AR/VR/XR 应用进行优化。

### 总结

imec 总裁兼首席执行官 Luc Van den hove 说：“我们相信 Swave 可以通过大量的研发计划和 imec 投资，将我们已经开发了五年多的基础技术推向市场，imec 在创新和产品化方面有着良好的记录，可以扩展到广泛的应用程序。我们致力于让 Swave 取得成功，并坚信凭借其广泛的专利组合以及对我们团队和生态系统的持续支持，Swave 可以成为沉浸式 3D 显示的最大颠覆者之一，并成为元界等应用程序的关键加速器“。

在未来，Swave 的变革性千兆像素全息技术也许可以推动价值 930 亿美元的 AR/VR 虚拟世界市场，并与领先的 AR/VR/XR 和元宇宙平台合作，创造出一个全息显示的新世界，让每个人都有能力在元宇宙中完成更多有趣的事情。

title: 【注释】
body: ①有：形容词词头。駜(bi必)： 马肥壮力强的样子。乘 (sheng剩)黄： 四匹黄马。乘， 四马为乘。 ②公：办公的处所。 明明： “勉勉”的假借。 马瑞辰《毛诗传笺通释》： “明、勉一声之转， 明明即‘勉勉’之假借，谓其在公尽力也。《笺》训为 ‘明明德’，失之。” ③振振：鸟群飞的样子。鹭：鹭鸶。古人用它的羽毛作舞衣，未舞时，持在手中。于： 同“曰”，语助词。 ④咽(yuan渊)咽：有节奏的鼓声。言语助词。于： 发声词。 胥： 皆、 都。 ⑤牡： 公马。 ⑥駽 (xuan宣)：铁青色的马。 ⑦载： 则、 就。 燕： 通“宴”。 ⑧以： 同 “而”。 有： 丰收。⑨君子： 指鲁僖公。 谷： 善。 诒 (yi仪)： 留给。

title: 译文
body: 马儿肥壮马儿肥壮，肥壮马儿四匹色黄。日夜办事都公堂，鞠躬尽瘁把政事忙。手拿鹭羽翩翩起舞，好像白鹭飞落地上。伴奏鼓声冬冬敲响，酒醉起舞摇摇晃晃，上下人人心花怒放。 马儿肥壮马儿肥壮，四匹公马身高体强。日夜办事都在公堂，公事之余同饮酒浆。手拿鹭翩翩起舞，好像白鹭自由翱翔。伴奏鼓声冬冬敲响，喝醉回家躺在床上。 下人人心花怒放。 马儿肥壮马儿肥壮，四匹青马气势昂昂。日夜办事在公堂，公事之余一齐举觞。从今开始不再遭殃，年年丰收粮食满仓。君子僖公做了好事， 世代相传子孙沾光。 上下人人心花怒放。

title: 清·沈德
body:
清·沈德潜：“鲁，诸侯也，安得有《颂》，至鲁有《颂》，且祀后稷以配天，非礼矣。今读《駉》以下四篇，皆僖公之诗。先儒谓季孙行父请于周而作《颂》。知东迁以上，鲁无《颂》也。即谓《颂》之变亦可。”(《说诗晬语》)

清·方玉润：“颂鲁侯燕不废公也。”(《诗经原始》卷十八)

今·程俊英：“这是颂祷鲁僖公和群臣宴会饮酒的诗。鲁国多年饥荒，自从僖公才采取了一些措施，克服了自然灾害，获得丰收。所以诗人写了这首诗。”(《诗经译注》，上海古籍出版社，1985年版)

【总案】 这诗赞颂的是鲁僖公。据《左传》等史书记载，鲁国多年饥荒，自僖公才采取一些措施，获得了丰收，民心稍稍安定，被称为中兴之君，因之诗人作诗颂扬他的功绩。此诗是赞颂鲁僖公和群臣饮宴，不废政事，人人欢乐并贻福后代。和《诗经》中的其他颂诗一样，本诗也有庙堂文学夸饰的不良倾向。在艺术上，诗人借马起兴，用马衬人;主旨蕴藉，表现手法宛曲;在结构上整饬中有变化，节奏上缓急结合，疏密有致，艺术价值较高。

title: The 3-Step Method for Discovering Truth About The Universe and Ourselves, Applied to Personal Wealth Management and Investing
body:
It is called the Trivium Method. It was used and taught by the ancient Greeks, but probably discovered much earlier. 

You probably use it in your daily life, but have never explicitly defined it or heard somebody else define it.

The three steps are \[Input → Processing → Output\]. Also called \[Grammar → Logic → Rhetoric\] or \[Knowledge → Understanding → Wisdom\]. These are just different ways of labeling the same process.

Essentially, these are the steps a conscious entity has to go through in order to answer any question about the objective world and to create a more accurate picture of reality. 

1 → The first step entails the gathering of raw data.

2 → The second step involves the analysis of the data. Active Thinking. Weeding out falsehoods by discovering contradictions.

3 → The third step involves applying the results from the second step to the real world.

For a better result, the method has to be reapplied to the new data generated by the third step.

\[1 → 2 → 3\] **→** \[1 → 2 → 3\] **→** \[1 → 2 → 3\] **→** \[1 → 2 → 3\] **→** \[1 → 2 → 3\] **→** …

The Quality of the discovered Truth will depend on how many times you applied the method to a specific question. 

Ok, that’s the Method. Now let’s apply it to personal wealth management and investing. 

1. Gather Information. Here we want to be as broad and inclusive as possible and use a diverse set of sources. Here are some important topics to consider:
   1. World Politics 
   2. Stock Market
   3. Crypto Market 
      1. Coins
      2. DApps and Protocols
   4. NFT Market 
   5. Tech/Scientific Advancements/Discoveries

2. Analyze the data and create a Spreadsheet of your financial portfolio. You could have different charts for different markets, but ideally, it’s all in one place, easy to retrieve and update. You should update your portfolio regularly. Your portfolio might have different asset categories, like 
   1. Cryptocurrencies
   2. Stocks
   3. Fiat Currencies
   4. NFTs
   5. LP Tokens
3. Execute trades. After crystallizing your thoughts into a concrete portfolio spreadsheet, it is time to trade assets and execute smart contracts in order to put your money where your mouth is. You might need to
   1. Trade
   2. Buy
   3. Hold
   4. Invest

Concrete Market Analysis, my Personal Spreadsheet, and efficient execution strategies/tools to follow.

title: Fracton Protocol Academy——hiBAYC
body:
The first two chapters of Fracton Protocol Acadamy introduced the fundraising process through Blind Box and BAYC fractions (People’s BAYC), which can be considered 1/1000 of a BAYC. However, since the ERC-1155 token is still indivisible, the liquidity issue for Blind Box and People’s BAYC still exists despite their contribution toward making blue-chip NFTs accessible for everyone. The lack of liquidity increases the difficulty of asset valuation, reducing the effectiveness of price discoveries through the “invisible hands”. To solve this problem, Fracton has introduced hiBAYC, planning to launch hiBAYC trading pairs on Uniswap and other cooperative CEXs.

For ease of expression, we will use BAYC as our target NFT to be fractionalized. The following rules will apply to other NFT collections, such as CryptoPunks, Sandbox, and Otherdeed.

**What is hiBAYC？**

hiBAYC is the BAYC fraction token in the ERC-20 standard. During the fundraising period, users can swap their Blind Boxes for hiBAYC at 1:1000. They can also convert their People’s BAYC to hiBAYC at the same rate after opening the Blind Boxes. That is to say, every hiBAYC token represents 1 in a million shares of a BAYC in Fracton’s BAYC Vault.

**How to get hiBAYC？**

First, users can use the Meta-Swap function on Fracton’s official site to exchange their Blind Box or People’s BAYC for hiBAYC. In addition, taking into account the better liquidity, lower transaction costs, and smoother user experience of centralized exchanges compared to DEX, Fracton will also work with the top CEXs for certain fundraising rounds, with the CEXs acting as the agent to support the fundraising. Users can subscribe for hiBAYC on the centralized exchanges and trade on the hiBAYC trading pairs when launched.\*\*
\*\*

**Repurchase**

You might be concern about the inflation caused by failed fundraising round. In such a case, the ratio between the total supply of hiBAYC and the number of BAYCs in the Vault will no longer remain 1,000,000:1. hiBAYC will depreciate in value.

Fracton has also considered this matter and designed a repurchase system to tackle the hiBAYC inflation problem caused by any failed fundraising round. Fracton will use the ETH raised from the failed round to buy back the accrued hiBAYC, with the repurchase price being the total ETH raised/(the number of Blind Box minted \* 1000). Due to technical reasons, our v1 version cannot execute the repurchase automatically. The repurchase will be carried out by the core members of Fracton as a temporary solution. We will include a decentralized and automatic repurchase system in the upcoming v2 update.

**Transaction Fees**

For each on-chain transaction of hiBAYC, the contract will charge a 0.2% transaction fee. Due to limitations in the current development stage, our v1 version is unable to decentralize the use of the transaction fees. In the upcoming v2 version, the DAO governance proposal will utilize the transaction fees wisely. They will play a more critical role in the Fracton ecosystem, such as providing liquidity on Uniswap, rewarding early participants, or rewarding early fundraisers.

So far, we have covered the majority of the fundraising function of Fracton Protocol. Fracton created Blind Box and People’s BAYC - tokens in the ERC-1155 standard - to overcome the barriers to purchasing blue-chip NFTs for ordinary investors. To further tackle the issue of lack of liquidity and inefficient pricing, Fracton created hiBAYC - a token in the ERC-20 standard. Since we have introduced all the fractionalized elements in the Fracton system, in our next chapter, we will be explaining in detail Fracton’s multi-standard decentralized exchange pool - Meta-Swap. This is a crucial component of Fracton Protocol, stay tuned!

\*\*
\*\*

**Next Chapter—— Meta-Swap**

title: 11: Erkiel's Journal, The Ashen Rift
body:
### Transmission from Valgueri The Myriad

**Current cycle:** 1092 PH / June 30, 2022, Prime Earth Local 
 **Current virtual identity**: Valgueri as [Protealax](https://opensea.io/assets/0xa406489360a47af2c74fc1004316a64e469646a5/9625) 
 **Current whereabouts**: Node 787 
 **Collection / Sphere reference:** [We Are All Going To Die](https://twitter.com/wagdie_eth)

I was able to translate another of Erkil’s journal entries. This one is interesting because it makes mention of an anomaly I’ve come across before in my studies: the mysterious Ashen Rift. In fact, Erkiel has included a map, showing the rift, though it seem to be drawn from memory, and the plane or world it lies upon is not clear. I’ve included that as well.


---

### From the journal of Erkeil The Stranger, Day 27

𝔗𝔥𝔢 𝔯𝔬𝔞𝔡 𝔦𝔰 𝔩𝔬𝔫𝔤 𝔞𝔫𝔡 𝔰𝔱𝔯𝔞𝔫𝔤𝔢 𝔱𝔥𝔯𝔬𝔲𝔤𝔥 𝔱𝔥𝔢 𝔉𝔬𝔯𝔰𝔞𝔨𝔢𝔫 𝔏𝔞𝔫𝔡𝔰.

Yesterday Hadrian and I passed a strange and motley group of travelers led by three tall and pale individuals, each of whom bore a crown of white light above their heads. They ignored our queries for directions or news of the land, and just walked on by silently. As they passed, one of the leaders turned to me. They wore a smooth, featureless mask, and in the air just at the center of the glowing arc, an eye of pale blue hovered.

![The Seal of The Righteous](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XqR2BpzDlXc1fuFzsYDwG.png?height=400&width=400)

“The Seal of the Righteous,” Hadrian whispered, and his words were full of awe…or perhaps fear.

I felt myself drawn to the floating eye; it pulled my attention and I let it, releasing myself to it. I began to feel dizzy, and then, suddenly, I was out of my physical body, transported to another place; another world. A world that felt familiar to me, though from dreams or my shadowed past I cannot be sure.

I found myself standing alone, feet planted on the solid rock, at the edge of a massive cliff. Far enough from the precipice to feel no danger, yet close enough to recommend a few prudent steps backward. From this vantage, I could see a wide coastal plain, beyond which a line of mountains, sharp as blades, rose into a flat sky filled with low clouds. It was quiet. As if the very air had been put to rest, and though I could move, everything around me was frozen in time.

Except for the eye. 

It hung, suspended between two great peaks, massive and forbidding in the distance. It was huge, and yet, it was the same eye I’d seen suspended above the pilgrim’s head. The same eye that pulled me here. About the eye, there rose a blazing ring of white fire, coming up from behind the peaks to arch above the eye, casting strange shadows over the landscape below.

There was a flash of blue light, almost imperceptible and then, slow as nightfall, the eye began to slide shut.

I was held there, suspended in space in time, the only living thing in all the world, as the eye closed, and, as its lids neared each other, the space within the ring of white fire became a pool of darkness, dark as night, with edges of ivory flame that slowly dimmed.

The space that was left looked like an orb—perhaps not unlike the moon, but, also not unlike a giant pupil itself, the center of the eye, and it filled me with dread and, strangely, excitement.

It was then that I knew this place, or one much like it, for there are many. The Ashen Rift. A portal that appears in a myriad of worlds, connecting them through time and space. How I know this, I cannot say, nor can I speculate the meaning of this vision aside from the knowledge that it is connected somehow to the events of this world, and, somehow, to me.

I am unsure how long I was held in this state, transported from my body to what feels more and more like a dream or a vision. Suddenly though, I felt my perception shift, and I fell back into my body, awakened by Hadrian’s rough hands on my shoulders, shaking me.

I let myself awaken, and tried to bring my senses back. I was in the same place, but time had passed.  My eyes were closed, and so I opened them, but they resisted as if the proverbial Sandman had visited me there, and his sand still weighed down my lids.

I saw that I hadn’t moved. I stood yet at the side of the road, though the pilgrims had moved on and the sun had set fully. I turned to thank Hadrian for waking me and found him stricken, a grimace of fear on his face.

“What is it?” I asked him.

“Your eyes…” 

I did not need a mirror to confirm the truth, knowing that he had seen the Ashen Rift reflected within me, just as I had witnessed it moments before.

I reassured him, though I don’t think he took much comfort in it, and then, suddenly overcome with weakness, I directed Hadrian to move off the road and set up camp.

![Erkiel's sketch of the Ashen Rift](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/berfdpr9DGccupveGPa7v.png?height=718&width=1744)

Hadrian and I shared a quiet meal, after which I tried to sketch what I had seen; a map of the land that held this version of the rift, though as I did so I could see, just on the other side of my parchment, other lands, stretching off into infinity. As I readied myself, exhausted, for sleep, I wondered if perhaps the Ashen Rift had brought me here to this land, and if I would see it here again here on the Forsaken World, or if perhaps this shred of memory is my own to hold.

That night I slept the sleep of the dead, dreamless and quiet.

This morning I woke to a hushed conversation. Hadrian had welcomed a visitor to our camp, a courier who gave us news of the road—dark words and tales of murder and death—as well [as a message](https://twitter.com/wagdie_eth/status/1542528384168628224) meant for travelers in this land; soon there will be a ritual, performed by a group known only as “The Coven” and we’ve been asked to attend.

We will make our way to this Coven’s Lair and see what we can learn. If all goes well—not a given here—we should arrive tonight.

\~Erkiel

### From the journal of Erkeil The Stranger, Day 27

I will try and relay as best I can what happened last night, however, I am still not entriely sure what transired there amongst the witches. And the voices of the others, my—my voice—ring loudly in my head.

Frogs and crows serenaded us on our way towards the Coven’s Lair and their ritual. The road was haunted, and as the light grew dim, a song began, at first whispered words on wind, but in time, a lamentation, the voices of the Coven riding the air like birds of the sea.

Things became confusing then. I remember it like a dream.

*Mundus est corruptus. Sic reviviscat.
Ditritim magam colete.
Ave maga.
Eius sanguine depingite.
Sanguine depingite
In imagine vestra mundum create.
Nostra Mortis vis est.
Eius sanguine create.
Mors novam vitam efficit. Hunc mundum destruat.*

The sound of a beast cut through the dusk. Just as the sun’s light faded, replaced by an eldrich light that seemed to come from everywhere, and nowhere.

And the chant continued.

Hadrian and I sought the other travelers. Seeking refuge in company.

The witches spoke and the voice of the beast joined theirs in chant. 

“Death is only the beginning of creation.”

And then is was done.

I awoke and knew I was from this world, that I am part and parcel of the 18th cycle. I had been here all along. But I wasn’t alone. There were others, my fellow travelers. Perhaps this explains my fractured memories, and my visions of other worlds.

I am the lost pilgrim. One of many, connected by chaos. Now I—we—seek The Conclave.

\~Erkiel

title: Time Power
body:
1. Think long term, project forward five and ten years and design your perfect life in every respect.
 2. Make a detailed plan today to achieve financial independence by a specific time in the future.
 3. Do what you love to do, determine the kind of work that would make you the happiest, then organize your life to do it in an excellent fashion.
 4. Once you have admitted a mistake, you no longer need to explain or justify yourself, you can then get on with the rest of your life.
 5. Say “no” to requests for your time that don’t move you toward your own goals and personal aspirations.
 6. Invest regually in self-improvement and in personal and professional development.
 7. In everything you do, act as if you are being carefully observed by others.
 8. Use your increased efficiency and productivity to create more time that you can spend with the people you care about the most.
 9. Dvided your life into two main parts, work and family. Prioritize almost all other activities as secondary to these two primary concerns. When you work, work all the time you work; when you are with your family, be there 100 percent of the time.
10. The quality of a relationship is largely determined by the amount of time you invest in that relationship.
11. Peace of mind is the greatest human good, and the goal of all human activity. To achieve greater peace of mind, listen to your intution, trust your inner voice.
12. Take excellent care of your physicla health, eat, exercise, rest, and behave in such a way that live to be age 90 or older.
13. Take at least one or two days off from work each week, and resolve to do nothing work-related on those days. Take the time to smell the roses.

title: USA Real Estate Firm Puts New York Building for Sale as NFT
body:
The NFT gives the buyer exclusive rights to “acquire the building all its uses rights & related deed covenants,” the firm said in a statement. “Due to the nature of real estate sales, the sale of the NFT does not warrant the completion of the real estate transaction, or reflect the transfer of the deed or title. The traditional real estate process must still be complete,” it explained. 

Okada & Company is selling a 46,299 sq. feet property in the USA, in New York City’s prestigious Chelsea neighborhood which is located on the West Side of the borough of Manhattan. It is a seven-story office and retail building in close proximity to Madison Square Park and other NYC landmarks. 

There is one token for this deal, and this NFT will be minted on the Ethereum blockchain, according to the realtor.

Chris Okada, CEO of Okada & Company, told Cryptonews.com that the company has already received expressions of interest in purchasing the building from a number of people, “but as we launched the sale of the property three-four days ago we are still in the beginning phases of the sale.”

**what impact could** the technology behind Bitcoin have?

blockchains, the technology underpinning the cryptocurrency, could revolutionize the world economy.

In the early 1990s, we said the old media is centralized. It’s one way, it’s one to many; it’s controlled by powerful forces, and everyone is a passive recipient. The new web, the new media, we said, is one to one, it’s many to many; it’s highly distributed, and it’s not centralized. Everyone’s a participant, not an inert recipient.

This has an awesome neutrality. It will be what we want it to be, and we can craft a much more egalitarian, prosperous society where everyone gets to share in the wealth that they create. Lots of great things have happened, but overall the benefits of the digital age have been asymmetrical. For example, we have this great asset of data that’s been created by us, and yet we don’t get to keep it. It’s owned by a tiny handful of powerful companies or governments. They monetize that data or, in the case of governments, use it to spy on us, and our privacy is undermined.
